website_summaries.verdict: Boasting unbeatable versatility and effortless portability at an affordable price, this outdoor blanket covers all the bases for picnics and other outings.
pros: Plush coral fleece inner for warmth and comfort
Large size offers ample seating space
Folds up compact with a hook-and-loop lined flap to hold it in place
cons: Refolding blanket takes trial and error

customer_reviews.title: Good product, could use padding/insulation.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blanket for the price. It is the largest you are likely to find, and as a 6'7" tall man I appreciate that fact greatly. The only downside is that the sheet is a bit thin, having little/no padding between the waterproof and fabric sides. I would have loved a small plush insert to insulate me from the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually quite durable. I use it as a cat-puke-catcher for my bed. They really like to puke all over the bed when they are displeased with my performance\service as their human. We also used it to line the spray-lined-with-gritty-$&!% truck bed to move a hutch, then a refrigerator and stove and this blanket DID NOT TEAR OR EVEN MAR.I would highly recommend this blanket for picnic/stadium use. It is absolutely waterproof. One side is rubber-like and the other is soft as a blanket. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Of Twin Cuties

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to just bring everywhere. I love it! I keep it in the back of my car everywhere I go. And when I go on a hike it’s small enough I can bring it with me so I can get to the top and eat a lunch with my boyfriend and enjoy it all before we go back down. I haven’t needed to wash it yet since I haven’t spilled any liquid on it. Anything else just stays off from the good ol shake before we fold it. Putting it on top of dewy wet grass is definitely dry on top and you can sit on it without soakin your tush.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanket - great for baby
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is incredible. We use it daily (leaving it out to cover a baby floor mat), wash it regularly, and frequently pack it up for outings. It's held up to constant use and washing and folds up easily and compactly. When I don't need it for the floor mat anymore I'll leave it folded in my car. I bought this to use for picnics and never expected we'd rely so heavily on it daily. It's thin but sturdy, lays flat easily, and is perfect for a large floor space for a baby on the move. Fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.author: M. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket. It is large enough for a 4 or 5 person picnic and now that it is Spring I use it constantly. I am satisfied with the water resistance. It is nice being able to pack this for a hike or picnic or camping and not have to worry about also packing a tarp. We have used it to picnic in snowy areas and wet areas and haven't had an issue with water soaking through. It is also lightweight and folds up easily. I love the colors and design. I looked at a lot of blankets like this, and this color scheme was by far my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is actually quite durable. I use it as a cat-puke-catcher for my bed. They really like to puke all over the bed when they are displeased with my performance\service as their human. We also used it to line the spray-lined-with-gritty-$&!% truck bed to move a hutch, then a refrigerator and stove and this blanket DID NOT TEAR OR EVEN MAR.I would highly recommend this blanket for picnic/stadium use. It is absolutely waterproof. One side is rubber-like and the other is soft as a blanket. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Of Twin Cuties

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Size!!
customer_reviews.text: It's such a great size to spread out - we have plenty of room for our entire family of 4 to have a picnic! I brought it to the park with friends and had 6 kids (5 and younger) and 3 adults all on it for lunch! It was tight, but we all fit on there! We had it on wet grass and blanket top stayed dry. Wish the flannel part was a little thicker...seems a little thin...that's my only complaint. :) I would recommend to friends :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Fall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, but hot fabric
customer_reviews.text: I’m pleased with the blanket overall. I chose it for it’s extra large size. Looks great and worked great. It was easy to refold. I was worried that the fabric side would be hot because it’s fleecy and it IS hot. That’s why I only gave 4 stars. Otherwise, I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TobysMommyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice picnic blanket!
customer_reviews.text: We use ours all the time. It is soft, large and waterproof. Just what we were hoping for. The only I wish were different was that it would easily find its way back into its correct formation and velcro closure. Could be operator error but my fiance cant get it back to velcro closure either so maybe we needed a diagram included. Its either us or the pocket is on wrong side. We just fold it up and go anyway. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Copperbratt

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We use it at softball so we can lay down or let our 11 month play on it. We take it on boat and lay it on shore to have picnics. Even on rocks it makes the ground better then nothing. Washes right up in washer. I let it hang dry. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this picnic blanket. We keep it in the trunk and use it weekly. It never fails to keep us dry and comfortable plus it’s big. My kids love how soft the fabric feels when they lay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Shavon

customer_reviews.title: I love this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket! It’s so big! It’s super durable I’ve used it so often, for picnics and it even survived a concert and lots of dancing. It got dirty so I hosed it off and let it dry in the yard and folded it back up and it’s like new again! Folding is a pain sometimes but that’s because it’s so big.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: decent for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blanket to cover mattresses at a rented cabin. It's not soft, but I put a flannel sheet on top of it and it was comfortable enough. It did the job and I'm looking forward to using it outside next year. I bought it when it was $23.99, not sure if I'd pay more than that for it.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait for the weather to get better
customer_reviews.text: Loved this blanket. THe bad part was me buying this right in the fall, so the weather isn't susceptible for having an outside outing. I was able to use it once during the fall when my nephew came in to town and we saw the laser light show at Stone Mountain park. It came in handy like you wouldn't believe. Glad I purchased. I like the color.
customer_reviews.author: DaveSincere

customer_reviews.title: I really like this blanket
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blanket! It spreads out to be quite expansive, but then folds up into an easy to travel with size. The top part of the blanket is very soft and comfortable to lay on and the bottom is easy to clean off in the case it becomes dirty. Would definitely recommend for those looking for a great picnic or camping blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Sher

customer_reviews.title: Must have for picnic fans
customer_reviews.text: We take this to the park all the time! And we can easily just throw it in the wash. Only downside is you have to hand it dry, which is a bit annoying in an apartment, and we can't always figure out how to fold it properly. But overall totally worth it for the price and quality
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend as part of a present. We've used it a couple of times, once at the beach and once at the park. The grass was slightly damp and I can say that it resisted that amount of water no problem. I wish it was a little thicker and that the fleece felt like a little higher quality material. However, for the price it is an excellent purchase and overall my girlfriend and I are quite happy.
customer_reviews.author: Erik P.

customer_reviews.title: This blanket make the picnic much comfortable. It has large size and great graphic pattern
customer_reviews.text: The spring just arrived last week and I took my dogs and friends to a park for picnic. This blanket make the picnic much comfortable. It has large size and great graphic pattern. Moreover its water resistance keep grass water away from us. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Me and my husband are very pleased with the quality and comfort of this XL blanket
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband are very pleased with the quality and comfort of this XL blanket. We used it at an outdoor jazz festival and we received so many compliments. We simply attached it our cooler for easy transport. This blanket will be utilized in the future at the beach, outdoor movie, picnics, etc. Very Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great material. Very big blanket
customer_reviews.text: Great material. Very big blanket. I’ve used it for picnics, beach days and lake. Everyone asks me where I bought it, as it fits about 4 sitting adults easily (maybe even 5). Does not get wet at bottom and once you get a hold of the folding style, it’s very easy to fold into a small rolled up blanket and easy to carry. Will purchase again once mine gets old (I expect it to be yrs to come) or if anything happens to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I've used it a couple of times, and this is a really nice blanket. The large size is really great, and it's well made. My ONLY complaint is, at the beach the wind would blow up the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Bud

customer_reviews.title: Received it and love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Received it and love the quality, and love the fact that it has a handle to carry around. Good material, very soft, and look forward to using it. I found the reviews really helps to make the purchase decision.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Mahony

customer_reviews.title: Great picnic blanket.
customer_reviews.text: We love this for the summer. We have seen other versions of this but this xL size gives us all the comfort we need. We have used it for grass, sand, and various other places.
customer_reviews.author: LRG T

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice, well made blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, well made blanket. I bought it to use at a food cart festival. Turns out we didn't need it but I still kept the blanket. It would be especially useful for younger kids to protect them from the ground. It looks easy to clean and I love that it's water resistant. I see many uses for it in my future.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, from the weight, to the size & protection! We took it with us all summer long to games n beach n park! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: The best most versatile thing you can have in your car. I live in the Pacific Northwest and this blanket is perfect for hiking, our crappy beaches and in case of emergencies while traveling over the snowy pass.
customer_reviews.author: Jfall

customer_reviews.title: Great for picnics or beach
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for backseat dog blanket but one side too slippery. Great for picnics or beach.
customer_reviews.author: Dandelion

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to embroider my parents last name on it. It’s soft and water proof and is a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Family

customer_reviews.title: Good practical blanket
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need to watch soccer games in the rain--stay warm and dry!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Jo

customer_reviews.title: Overall I’m pleased with this blanket
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m pleased with this blanket. It’s huge! And it really is water resistant! We have used it on damp grass and no water made it through. It is a bit slippery on the fleece side though so just be careful if you’re walking on it. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Oswaldo Cuautle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and definitely water resistant
customer_reviews.text: Probably not its intended purpose, but this blanket has been great under our puppy's pen. Strong and definitely water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Loved it as a waterproof puppy pen liner
customer_reviews.text: Holds up well when used as a blanket for our foster puppies. Washed and dried many times.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: This outdoor blanket arrives in a very good condition. I plan to bring my kids out ...
customer_reviews.text: This outdoor blanket arrives in a very good condition. I plan to bring my kids out for picnic as Spring is coming soon. I like the size and quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: F. S.

customer_reviews.title: It was by far the best of all the ones i tried
customer_reviews.text: I tried out a number of picnic blankets before settling on this one. It was by far the best of all the ones i tried.
customer_reviews.author: MJRJM

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket! Great buy! It fit 6 people when I took it on a picnic to watch 4th of July fireworks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is really an exceptional blanket- great for beaches and parks as it's water resistant on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really an exceptional blanket- great for beaches and parks as it's water resistant on the bottom and soft and warm on top and folds up small. The only problem I have with it is how you fold it up- it's a little confusing and not easy to do with just one person. It could have been better thought out, but still a great outdoor blanket.
customer_reviews.author: rags

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: The blanket itself is very thin so don't count on it insulating you from a cold surface. But the blanket is huge, definitely big enough for family to sit and have a picnic :)
customer_reviews.author: BarbieToes305

customer_reviews.title: Best all-around picnic blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Large enough to comfortably fit 3-4 people AND the food. Nice, soft material to sit or lie down on. The back is water-resistant, but I haven't had to test that just yet.
customer_reviews.author: Henny Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love this blanket.
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this blanket. It folds back up easily, it's lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Adams

customer_reviews.title: A little thinner than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for keeping us warm and dry at tailgates and games! A little thinner than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: lindsley mcgrath

customer_reviews.title: Must-have family item for the trunk
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and used it all summer long with the family in our own backyard, at parks, etc. Shakes off nicely and is easy to fold back up. Several friends saw ours and bought their own!
customer_reviews.author: C&J

customer_reviews.title: They indicated that this blanket is great, used both on their boat
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a family member that has a boat. They indicated that this blanket is great, used both on their boat, and to use on the ground when picnicking outside. The water-resistance feature is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: N.A. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Huge (a normal sized person can completely lie within its ...
customer_reviews.text: Huge (a normal sized person can completely lie within its borders) Soft (fleece) Machine washable (who wants to wash the bottom of this thing after it's been sitting on damp grass all day? not me.)
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: This blanket is perfect! Its large enough to have 3-4 people sit ...
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is perfect! Its large enough to have 3-4 people sit on and its moisture proof backing is worth it's weight in gold. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I havent used it yet but its pretty
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Blanket to have it is big enough to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Blanket to have it is big enough to fit in the truck bed for when you can't layout on the ground. And it kept us dry when i had to put it down on the wet ground.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and helps protect the back of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and helps protect the back of the car from dog hair and dirty paws. Dog seems to like it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Travis M.

customer_reviews.title: It's great, but don't ever think you'll actually fit it ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great, but don't ever think you'll actually fit it back into the pouch once you take it out. I just put mine in a tote bag
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked very well. Not sure how to wash it but I think you will have to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Realalien

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's large and comfortably fits two average ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's large and comfortably fits two average adults laying down. Plastic on one side and a soft material on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Nice cozy blanket!
customer_reviews.text: Cozy, very nice blanket for fall and the outdoors. Good size for family.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick J.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. I didn't need it to be THIS ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I didn't need it to be THIS big, but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Luckywales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blanket for the bleachers.. lining blocks the wind perfectly
customer_reviews.author: TRACEYMATA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product and makes a picnic in the park very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Really good blanket and very large
customer_reviews.text: Really good blanket and very large. I wanted something that was soft and water proof - also that you could machine wash, and this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: We used as a blanket on our trip to the great canyon , it got down to 30 degrees and was still warm and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Meli

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket! Folds easily and is large enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket! Folds easily and is large enough for our family of four to enjoy a nice pick nick. Well made, the fleece is soft and will keep you warn when wrapped in it. The reverse side will keep the blanket dry while laying in wet grass. Very satisfied with this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: ... away as a gift to a couple and they loved it
customer_reviews.text: I gave this away as a gift to a couple and they loved it
customer_reviews.author: MacD23

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we wanted on the beach. It will be put to good use for many other things, Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn R Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: This is good.. I prob should have just bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is good..I prob should have just bought a sleeping bag though. I am using it to cover the fold down bed in my RV so my large dogs can sleep on it without damaging anything. This does fold up nice, but I do not care for the crackling noise it makes...neither does my Golden...he is getting used to it though.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Mountain Biking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Sand Dunes, lots of room for two, so we bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: Randy S Wills

customer_reviews.title: He uses this blanket as a beach blanket and says that it makes an excellent choice to take to the beach
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, who had moved to Hawaii. He was sleeping underneath a friend's house on the ocean side of Kauaii, where the wind was very strong. He needed a blanket to protect him from the wind as well as the rain. Now that he is in a different location. He uses this blanket as a beach blanket and says that it makes an excellent choice to take to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great all-around picnic blanket. Convenient for transporting...nice large size...and great for damp ground.
customer_reviews.author: on-the-go

customer_reviews.title: I don't feel like I can give it a five because I've only ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like I can give it a five because I've only used it once. So far, so good though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mitchell-seiser

product_meta.title: HYSEAS Outdoor Picnic Blanket Plaid - Extra Large Portable Water-Resistant Handy Mat for Camping, Beach - Waterproof and Sandproof - 73x80 Inch
product_meta.description:
Fabric: 

100% polyester 

Specification: 

Size: 50"X60" 

Features: 

HS all purpose blanet provides a great solution for you when you want to go beach,park or just sometime a picnic in your garden. HS outdoor picnic blankets are prefect for picnics, outdoor concerts, star gazing or as a car blanket. HS outdoor picnic blanket made of cozy polyester fleece with a water-resistant backing to protect you and the blanket from moisture. 

Once you reach your destination, it unfolds into a spacious 73 X 80 inches water-resistant blanket, keep everyone's picnic clean and dry. Light weight, easy to carry around. 

About us: 

HYSEAS TEXTILE is a company specialized in developing, manufacturing and selling fleece blankets, bedding collections, outdoor blanket and so on. Our products have been favored by European and American consumers for many years. 

Recently, HS has launched a serises of Products with high-quality material and unique art design. All products have passed the strictest European BSCI testing. 

More than 4 million fleece blankets have been sold by us. Our products are made from 150D/288F microfiber. They are thicker, more anti-pilling and durable than other goods made out of 150D/144F fabric which is commonly used.
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE PICNIC BLANKET: Hyseas portable waterproof and sand proof outdoor blanket is about 73x80 Inches when opened, can comfortably fit up to 4-5 adults for your whole family. After folded, you can easily shrink down to small pieces, perfect for you to carry out to travelling and camping

DELICATE 3-LAYER DESIGN: Thick and soft fuzzy polyester fleece on the top makes it more comfortable than other blankets, The PEVA water-resistance layer backing let it easy to clean and provide more thermal insulation and moisture-proof. What is more, The sturdy sewn-in insert makes folding easy after outdoor activity

MULTIPLE CHOICES: This Light-weight soft waterproof plaid picnic blanket owns three differents style for customers to choose: BLUE, GREEN, and GREY. Stylish plaid tartan printing could help you become the unique landscape outside

BEST GIFTS in FOUR SEASONS: Whether it is spring or summer, Hyseas soft outdoor travel picnic mat makes a great present for your family members and friends for any time of the year. Best gifts for camping, hiking, climbing, travelling, stargazing, picnic on grass, beach.

EASY CARE & WARRANTY: Machine wash or wipes clean, hang to dry, simple easy to clean. For some reason, if you are not satisfied with, please do not hesitate to contact our customer service. We offer full refunds on items returned within 30 days
